name: UpdateCandidateInfo
description:
Update an existing candidate's information.

Use this tool to update the details of an existing candidate. Make sure you have the required permissions. For setting custom field values, use the `customFields.setValue` endpoint.

parameters.name: candidate_update_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing details to update a candidate such as name, email, phone number, social links, etc. Includes 'candidateId' to specify which candidate to update. 'sendNotifications' (boolean) to notify subscribed users of the update, default is true.

name.description: The first and last name of the candidate to update.

alternateEmail.description: An alternate email address to add to the candidate's profile.

socialLinks.description:
An array of social links to set on the candidate. This value replaces existing socialLinks that have been set on the candidate. 
If this value is submitted along with linkedInUrl, gitHubUrl or websiteUrl fields, those values will be ignored.

sendNotifications.description: Whether or not users who are subscribed to the candidate should be notified that candidate was updated. Default is true.
